Green Shared Hosting Offers:

All of our green shared hosting plans are hosted in Montreal area in Canada and are 100% powered by hydroelectricity, a renewable energy. It is one of the most eco-friendly datacenter in the world, as can be seen from its energy efficiency record (PUE of 1.09). Servers require considerable amounts of electricity to operate and need constant cooling to prevent overheating. In most places, this electricity is produced by burning coal or other fossil fuels, which creates emissions that accelerate climate change. The experts think that datacenters will make up 10% of global electricity usage by 2030, and generate more emissions than the entire airline industry. You can fight climate change by using our products.

All of our green shared hosting plans include free DDoS protection. It provides your websites with round-the-clock protection against all types of DDoS attack, without any limitations in terms of volume or duration.

Use PROMO code HD-S21 for 25% OFF recurring
